Powerful Performance: Apple A19 chipset with hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU for unmatched speed and graphics. Dual Main Camera System: 48MP wide and 48MP ultrawide with advanced OIS, HDR, and 4K Dolby Vision HDR video recording. High-Resolution Front Camera: 18MP wide lens with OIS, SL 3D depth sensor, Dolby Vision HDR, and spatial audio. Next-Generation Connectivity: Extensive 5G band support, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, Ultra Wideband (gen2), GPS with multi-band positioning, and satellite SOS. Long-Lasting Battery: 3692 mAh with fast wired charging (50% in 20 minutes), MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging, and reverse charging support. Kong)iPhone 17OverviewThe iPhone 17 redefines innovation with a sleek design, powerful performance, and advanced connectivity. Built with a Ceramic Shield 2 front, aluminum frame, and glass back, it combines durability with elegance. The device introduces a 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with up to 3000 nits peak brightness, ensuring stunning visuals in any environment. Powered by the groundbreaking Apple A19 chipset built on a 3nm process, it delivers unmatched speed and efficiency for both everyday use and demanding applications.With advanced camera systems, including a dual 48MP main setup and an 18MP front camera with Dolby Vision HDR support, photography and videography reach new heights. The iPhone 17 is designed for seamless global connectivity, supporting extensive 5G bands, Wi-Fi 7, and satellite communication for emergency use. Its software, iOS 26, enhances productivity and personalization while offering a secure and intuitive user experience.Key FeaturesPremium Design: Glass front with Ceramic Shield 2, aluminum frame, and IP68 dust and water resistance.Immersive Display: 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and 3000 nits peak brightness.Powerful Performance: Apple A19 chipset with hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU for unmatched speed and graphics.Dual Main Camera System: 48MP wide and 48MP ultrawide with advanced OIS, HDR, and 4K Dolby Vision HDR video recording.High-Resolution Front Camera: 18MP wide lens with OIS, SL 3D depth sensor, Dolby Vision HDR, and spatial audio.Next-Generation Connectivity: Extensive 5G band support, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, Ultra Wideband (gen2), GPS with multi-band positioning, and satellite SOS.Long-Lasting Battery: 3692 mAh with fast wired charging (50% in 20 minutes), MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging, and reverse charging support.Ample Storage: Available in 256GB and 512GB NVMe options with 8GB RAM.Colors: Black, White, Mist Blue, Sage, and Lavender.

details.description_text: NO return is applicable if the seal is broken• 10-day seller replacement guarantee• No returns will be applicable in case of change of mind.• In Accidental Cases Mobile (Broken Display, Dent, Burn, Shock, Water Damage or Manual Update or Root) service Warranty or replacement guarantee will not be applicable• 0% EMI available. If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.Unmatched Display BrillianceThe Realme 15 redefines smartphone visuals with its groundbreaking 6.8-inch OLED display, setting new standards in its class. Boasting an extraordinary 6500 nits peak brightness - the highest in any smartphone - it delivers perfect visibility even under harsh sunlight. The 144Hz refresh rate ensures buttery-smooth scrolling and gaming, while the industry-leading 4608Hz PWM dimming significantly reduces eye strain during prolonged use. With a crisp 1280 x 2800 resolution (453 ppi) and support for 1 billion colors, every image pops with stunning clarity and vibrant hues. The 91.2% screen-to-body ratio achieved through minimal bezels and Gorilla Glass protection creates an immersive viewing experience that rivals premium flagships.Military-Grade Durability Meets EleganceRealme has engineered the 15 to withstand life's toughest challenges without compromising on style. Available in three sleek color variants with subtly different thickness profiles (7.66mm to 7.96mm), it maintains an impressively lightweight design at just 187-189g. The IP68/IP69 certification ensures complete protection against dust and water immersion up to 2 meters for 30 minutes, while the MIL-STD-810H compliance guarantees resilience against drops and extreme conditions. This ruggedness is cleverly concealed beneath a premium exterior that belies its tough nature, proving that protection and aesthetics can coexist harmoniously.Next-Level PerformanceAt its core, the Realme 15 packs the cutting-edge MediaTek Dimensity 7300+ chipset built on an efficient 4nm process. The octa-core CPU configuration combines four powerful Cortex-A78 cores with four efficient Cortex-A55 cores, delivering flagship-level performance optimized for power efficiency. The Mali-G615 MC2 GPU handles graphics-intensive tasks effortlessly, making it an excellent choice for mobile gamers. Running the latest Android 15 with Realme UI 6.0, users can expect a smooth, bloat-free experience with regular software updates that extend the device's longevity.Professional-Grade PhotographyThe Realme 15's camera system punches far above its weight class. The 50MP main sensor features a large 1/1.56" sensor size, PDAF, and optical image stabilization for stunning low-light shots. It's complemented by an 8MP ultra-wide lens with a 112° field of view for expansive landscapes. Both cameras support 4K video recording with gyro-EIS and OIS stabilization for buttery-smooth footage. The 50MP front camera captures incredibly detailed selfies and also supports 4K video, making this one of the most capable camera phones in its segment for both photography and videography enthusiasts.Unprecedented Battery EnduranceWith its massive 7000mAh battery - one of the largest in any smartphone - the Realme 15 sets new benchmarks for battery life. Even power users will struggle to drain this powerhouse in a single day. When recharge is needed, the blistering 80W wired charging can juice up the device in record time. This combination of marathon endurance and sprint charging makes it ideal for travelers, outdoor enthusiasts, and anyone who demands reliable all-day performance from their device.Smart Features That Elevate the ExperienceBeyond its impressive hardware, the Realme 15 includes thoughtful features that enhance daily use. The under-display optical fingerprint sensor offers both security and convenience, while stereo speakers provide immersive audio. The inclusion of an infrared port is a welcome throwback feature for controlling appliances. With Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.4, connectivity is fast and reliable, while comprehensive satellite positioning (GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS) ensures accurate navigation.The New Mid-Range BenchmarkThe Realme 15 represents a quantum leap in what consumers can expect from mid-range smartphones. It combines a best-in-class display, professional camera capabilities, military-grade durability, and exceptional battery life in a package that challenges premium flagships. While it lacks some features like NFC and wireless charging, its strengths more than compensate, making it one of the most compelling devices in its class. For users who refuse to compromise on quality but need to watch their budget, the Realme 15 sets a new standard for value-packed performance.

details.description_text: Tecno Spark 40 Pro (8/128GB)Display: 6.78 inches, 1.5K Ultra Bright AMOLED Processor: Mediatek Helio G100 Ultimate (6nm) Camera: 50MP + 13MP Features: Under Display Fingerprint sensor DescriptionOperating SystemAndroid 15ProcessorMediaTek Helio 100 UltimateNetwork2G3G4GDimension163.67*75.87*6.69mmDisplay144Hz 6.78'' AMOLED Flexible DisplayResolution1224*2720CameraFront: 13MPRear: 50MP, Rear Dual FlashMemory128GB+16GB* (8GB Extended RAM)ConnectivityGPSWiFiBTFMOTGNFCSensorSoftware GyroscopeInfrared Remote ControlBattery Capacity5200mAh45W Super ChargingLoudspeakerDual SpeakersDolby AtmosTecno Spark 40 Pro (8/128GB)The Tecno Spark 40 Pro (8/128GB) is designed for users who demand more more speed, more clarity, more innovation. With a dazzling AMOLED display, a powerful MediaTek chipset, and a massive battery, this phone redefines what you expect from a mid-range device. Whether you're gaming, creating content, or just scrolling endlessly, the Spark 40 Pro is built to impress.Tecno Spark 40 Pro SpecificationDive into immersive visuals with a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED screen that shines at an impressive peak brightness of 4500 nits. Whether you’re outside under direct sunlight or watching late-night content, the Corning Gorilla Glass 7i ensures top-tier durability while the ultra-thin bezels bring you closer to a truly edge-to-edge experience. The 144Hz refresh rate keeps animations silky smooth, perfect for gaming or rapid multitasking.Display Size: 6.78-inchDisplay Type: 1.5K Ultra Bright AMOLEDRefresh Rate: 144hzBrightness: 4500nits PeakProtection: Corning Gorilla Glass 7iFeatures: Super thin bezelsProcessor: Mediatek Helio G100 Ultimate (6nm)CPU Type: Octa-coreRAM: 8GBROM: 128GBRear Camera: 50MPFront Camera: 13MPFingerprint: Under Display Fingerprint sensorBattery Type: 5200mAhFast Charging: 45WSpeed Meets EfficiencyUnder the hood, the Spark 40 Pro is powered by the MediaTek Helio G100 Ultimate processor, a 6nm chipset designed for performance without compromise. The octa-core CPU architecture ensures fluid responsiveness, whether you're running heavy apps, editing photos, or switching between tasks. With 8GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage, you get ample space and speed to handle everything seamlessly.Capture Your World with PrecisionPhotography gets a serious boost with the 50MP AI rear camera, enhanced with dual flash for low-light brilliance. Record vivid memories in up to 2560x1440 resolution, ensuring crisp detail in every frame. Selfies are just as sharp, thanks to the 13MP front camera, also backed by dual flash and capable of Full HD 1080p video recording. Whether it's a selfie moment or landscape shot, the Spark 40 Pro has you covered.Feel Every BeatEnjoy crystal-clear sound with dual stereo speakers powered by Dolby Atmos. From movies to music, your audio experience gets a major upgrade, delivering rich, 3D-like soundscapes that make every moment come alive.Everything You Need, All in One PlaceStay connected with dual SIM 4G support, Wi-Fi 5 (5GHz), and Bluetooth 5.3. Navigate confidently with built-in GPS and A-GPS. The under-display fingerprint sensor adds a modern, secure touch, while the IP64 water and dust resistance ensures everyday protection. Bonus? The built-in IR remote control turns your phone into a smart hub for your home. 5200mAh Battery with 45W Fast ChargingBuilt to Withstand, Designed to ImpressWith a massive 5200mAh battery, the Tecno Spark 40 Pro is built to last all day and then some. When it’s time to recharge, the 45W fast charging technology powers up your device in no time—so you're never out of action for long. Despite its power-packed features, the Spark 40 Pro stays slim at just 6.7mm thick. It’s SGS-certified for drop resistance, ensuring added protection in real-life usage. The premium design, combined with durability and a compact footprint, makes this phone as tough as it is beautiful.

The slim bezels ensure an immersive viewing experience, making it great for videos, gaming, and everyday use.Under the hood, the Hot 60i is powered by the MediaTek Helio G81 Ultimate chipset with an Octa-core CPU (2x Cortex-A75 + 6x Cortex-A55) and ARM G52 MC2 GPU, delivering smooth multitasking and gaming. It runs on Android v15 with XOS 15.1 UI, paired with 6GB LPDDR4X RAM and 128GB storage, expandable up to 1TB via microSD.For photography, the device features a 50MP dual rear camera setup (f/1.8 wide + 0.08MP auxiliary lens) with HDR, digital zoom, and dual-LED flash. On the front, it has an 8MP selfie camera (f/2.0) capable of HD video recording.In terms of design, the phone measures 166 x 76.6 x 7.7 mm, weighs 188g, and comes with a glass front, plastic back, and plastic frame. With IP64 certification, the phone is splash and dust resistant.Battery life is one of its strong points, equipped with a 5160mAh Li-Polymer battery that supports 45W fast charging (50% in just 24 minutes) and 10W reverse wired charging.Connectivity options include Dual SIM (Nano + Nano) with 2G, 3G, and 4G LTE, VoLTE, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.3, GPS with A-GPS, NFC, and USB Type-C 2.0.Security is handled by a side-mounted fingerprint scanner and Face Unlock, along with sensors like light, proximity, accelerometer, compass, and gyroscope.For multimedia, the Hot 60i comes with FM Radio, a loudspeaker, 3.5mm audio jack, and support for 1440p/1080p video playback. It was released in 2024, on May 31. Honor 200 has 6.7 inch, OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR, 4000 nits (peak), a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels screen. It uses Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) CPU, Adreno 720 GPU. Honor 200 supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). Honor 200 5G has 5MP Triple main camera, 5MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5200 mAh, non-removable battery.Display:6.7 inches OLED Capacitive Touchscreen, 1B colors supported punch hole display phone has a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels with a PPI of 436.Body and sensors:Made of a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back, the mobile is 161.5 mm in height, 74.6 mm wide, and 7.7 mm in thickness. It weighs 187 g available. The mobile is available in 4 colors on the market. The colors are Black, Silver, Blue & Pink. Being a sensor accelerometer, gyro, compass, ultrasound proximity, and light sensor. The under-display, optical fingerprint runs quite accurately fast. Face unlock is correct & secured.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.Performance:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm), Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) processor on the phone.RAM and ROM:The company has launched the phone in 5 variants of 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB, 16GB/256GB, 12GB/512GB & 16GB/512GB. In the case of gaming, graphics, and RAM are fairly good. FHD-quality graphics games can be easily run and played quite smoothly.Camera:The Honor 200 is well-equipped in the camera department. The 50MP primary camera is coupled with the 1/1.56” Sony IMX906 sensor with OIS support. Moreover, it also houses a telephoto lens as well as an ultrawide/macro camera as auxiliary units. The former is a 50MP shooter with the Sony IMX856 sensor while the latter is a 12MP snapper. In the meantime, the front camera is also a 50MP unit.The Back of the phone has a 50MP+50MP+12MP camera with which you can record beautiful quality pictures and a maximum of 4k@30fps video. Moreover, it remains an extra feature like The phone has a 50MP selfie camera with which you can take beautiful quality pictures and selfies. You can record a maximum of 4k@30fps video with the front camera. High–quality selfie work can be done effortlessly with the camera on the phone.Battery:This phone packs a large 5,200 mAh battery with 100W wired charging support. The cell in the Honor 200 is the company’s silicon-carbon battery that offers a leading level of endurance. With this, you can get an average of up to 110 hours of standby time, and 13 hours of net browsing. At full charge, you can talk for up to 35 hours on 2G. It was released in 2024, on May 31. Honor 200 has 6.7 inch, OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR, 4000 nits (peak), a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels screen. It uses Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) CPU, Adreno 720 GPU. Honor 200 supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). Honor 200 5G has 5MP Triple main camera, 5MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5200 mAh, non-removable battery.Display:6.7 inches OLED Capacitive Touchscreen, 1B colors supported punch hole display phone has a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels with a PPI of 436.Body and sensors:Made of a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back, the mobile is 161.5 mm in height, 74.6 mm wide, and 7.7 mm in thickness. It weighs 187 g available. The mobile is available in 4 colors on the market. The colors are Black, Silver, Blue & Pink. Being a sensor accelerometer, gyro, compass, ultrasound proximity, and light sensor. The under-display, optical fingerprint runs quite accurately fast. Face unlock is correct & secured.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.Performance:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm), Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) processor on the phone.RAM and ROM:The company has launched the phone in 5 variants of 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB, 16GB/256GB, 12GB/512GB & 16GB/512GB. In the case of gaming, graphics, and RAM are fairly good. FHD-quality graphics games can be easily run and played quite smoothly.Camera:The Honor 200 is well-equipped in the camera department. The 50MP primary camera is coupled with the 1/1.56” Sony IMX906 sensor with OIS support. Moreover, it also houses a telephoto lens as well as an ultrawide/macro camera as auxiliary units. The former is a 50MP shooter with the Sony IMX856 sensor while the latter is a 12MP snapper. In the meantime, the front camera is also a 50MP unit.The Back of the phone has a 50MP+50MP+12MP camera with which you can record beautiful quality pictures and a maximum of 4k@30fps video. Moreover, it remains an extra feature like The phone has a 50MP selfie camera with which you can take beautiful quality pictures and selfies. You can record a maximum of 4k@30fps video with the front camera. High–quality selfie work can be done effortlessly with the camera on the phone.Battery:This phone packs a large 5,200 mAh battery with 100W wired charging support. The cell in the Honor 200 is the company’s silicon-carbon battery that offers a leading level of endurance. With this, you can get an average of up to 110 hours of standby time, and 13 hours of net browsing. At full charge, you can talk for up to 35 hours on 2G. The phone will take about 27 minutes with 100W supper fast charging to fully charge.

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.Smartphone Full SpecificationsCategoryDetailsNetworkTechnology: GSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GLaunchAnnounced: 2025, May 29 Status: Available. Released 2025, June 05BodyDimensions: 164.3 x 74.6 x 7.5 mm (6.47 x 2.94 x 0.30 in) Weight: 188.5 g (6.67 oz) Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 7i), plastic frame, plastic back SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM IP64 dust tight & water resistant (splashes)DisplayType: AMOLED, 144Hz, 2304Hz PWM, 1300 nits (peak) Size: 6.78 inches, 109.9 cm² (~89.7% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution: 1080 x 2436 pixels (~393 ppi density) Protection: Corning Gorilla Glass 7iPlatformOS: Android 15 (planned upgrade to Android 16), HIOS 15 Chipset: Mediatek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate (4 nm) CPU: Octa-core (4x2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4x2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) GPU: Mali-G615 MC2MemoryCard slot: No Internal: 128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM Storage Type: UFS 2.2Main CameraDual: 64 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 1/1.73", 0.8µm, PDAF + 2 MP, f/2.4 (depth) Features: LED flash, HDR, panorama Video: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fpsSelfie CameraSingle: 13 MP Video: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fpsSoundLoudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers (Dolby Atmos) 3.5mm Jack: NoCommsWLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6, dual-band Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE Positioning: GPS NFC: Yes Infrared port: Yes Radio: FM radio USB: USB Type-C 2.0, OTGFeaturesSensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, proximity, compass Extra: Circle to SearchBatteryType: Li-Po 5500 mAh Charging: 45W wired (50% in 15 min, 100% in 45 min)MiscColors: Neon Cyan, Magic Silver, Geek Black Models: LJ8kSmartphone DescriptionThis smartphone blends elegant design, powerful performance, and modern features to deliver an all-round experience. Measuring 164.3 x 74.6 x 7.5 mm and weighing just 188.5g, it offers a slim, lightweight build with a Gorilla Glass 7i front, plastic frame, and back. With IP64 protection, it’s resistant to dust and water splashes, making it durable for everyday use.The 6.78-inch AMOLED display brings visuals to life with a 144Hz refresh rate, 2304Hz PWM dimming, and up to 1300 nits peak brightness. Paired with a 1080 x 2436 pixel resolution (~393 ppi) and Corning Gorilla Glass 7i protection, the screen delivers smooth, vibrant, and immersive viewing.Under the hood, the phone runs Android 15 with a planned upgrade to Android 16, powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate (4nm) chipset, Octa-core CPU, and Mali-G615 GPU. Storage options include 128GB with 6GB or 8GB RAM using UFS 2.2 technology, ensuring fast performance and smooth multitasking.On the rear, a 64MP wide lens with PDAF and a 2MP depth sensor capture detailed photos, supported by LED flash, HDR, and panorama. Video recording reaches up to 4K@30fps. The 13MP selfie camera also supports 4K video, perfect for crisp selfies and video calls.Audio quality is enhanced with stereo speakers featuring Dolby Atmos, though it lacks a 3.5mm jack. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.4, NFC, infrared port, GPS, FM radio, and USB Type-C with OTG support.For security and convenience, it includes an under-display fingerprint sensor, accelerometer, proximity sensor, compass, and the innovative Circle to Search feature.A robust 5500mAh Li-Po battery powers the device, supporting 45W fast charging (50% in just 15 minutes, 100% in 45 minutes), keeping you connected all day with minimal downtime.Available in stylish colors – Neon Cyan, Magic Silver, and Geek Black – this model, LJ8k, is designed for users who demand both style and performance.

Brand: Apple Model: iPhone 15 Pro Display Size: 6.1 inches Display Type: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000–2000 nits Display Resolution: 1179 x 2556 pixels Chipset: Apple A17 Pro (3 nm) Memory: 128GB | 256GB | 512GB Main Camera: 48 MP (wide) | 12 MP (periscope telephoto) | 12 MP (ultrawide) | TOF 3D LiDAR scanner (depth) | Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR (photo/panorama) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps 10-bit HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 60fps), ProRes, Cinematic mode (4K@24/30 fps), 3D (spatial) Selfie Camera: 12 MP (wide) | SL 3D, (depth/biometrics sensor) | HDR, Cinematic mode (4K@24/30fps) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps, 1080p@25/30/60/120fps, gyro-EIS Battery Info: Li-Ion, non-removable; Type-C Wired Charging; 15W wireless (MagSafe) iPhone 15 ProIntroducing the Apple iPhone 15 Pro, a groundbreaking masterpiece in the world of smartphones. This extraordinary device marks a historic milestone as Apple's first-ever titanium-built iPhone, setting new standards for durability and design. Boasting impressive build quality, its sleek exterior houses a display that offers unparalleled clarity, elevating your visual experience to new heights. Equipped with an unbelievably capable camera, it redefines photography and videography, delivering stunningly clear and vibrant visuals. Powered by a pro-grade processor, in seamless collaboration with an advanced operating system, it ensures outstanding performance. With remarkable battery life and fast charging capabilities, the iPhone 15 Pro stands as one of the finest smartphones to date, setting a benchmark for innovation and excellence. iPhone 15 Pro FeaturesCrafted using aerospace-grade titanium combined with distinctive finishesTitanium construction renders it among the lightest and most robust smartphones availableFeatures an LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display for exceptional visual experienceThe legacy of Dynamic Island continues to keep you informed with each notificationEquipped with the formidable A17Pro Bionic chipset for flawless performanceCutting-edge Monsters 3nm CPU and a Pro-Class GPU for immersive mobile gaming48MP triple camera system, delivering mesmerizing photography with unparalleled detailCapture enchanting videos with pristine clarity and the ability to relive them with VisionProA multi-functional action button designed to enhance convenience and controlOffers a positive battery with advanced optimization, ensuring daylong battery lifeComes with a Universal Type-C charger to guarantee seamless iPhone charging Introduces the newly added emergency service of Roadside Assistance via satellite

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 Get your movie moments come alive and dive into gaming instantly with Samsung’s Galaxy Z Fold7. This fold is not any normal device, it unfolds into a creative canvas and while folded it becomes a pocket-friendly smartphone. And this folding and unfolding is protected with the world's greatest Armor FlexHinge design which makes it thinner than before. Besides its incredible built quality, you also get a stunning large display when unfolded to view your movies immersively. And when folded, it’s ready for your everyday productivity in one compact package. Talking about productivity, there's the Snapdragon's Elite chipset inside, which gives you octa-core processing for handling your everyday tasks and gaming activity smoothly. Moreover, you can also capture gorgeous photos and videos from its rear triple camera lens. When you require better photography edits, there’s Galaxy AI, ready for all your magic edits & customization. All that awesome power can be enjoyed longer with a large battery inside, which gives you hours of efficiency in productivity & multimedia consumption. Featuring a vivid 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a powerful Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, and industry-leading 100W fast charging, this smartphone is built to keep up with everything your day throws at you—from multitasking to mobile gaming to content creation.Features of Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5GAMOLED Display with Up to 144Hz Refresh Rate, Dimensity 8350 Ultimate Chipset, Pro-Grade Camera System with Dual OIS & 4K Video, 5200mAh Battery with 100W Fast Charging.AMOLED Display with Up to 144Hz Refresh RateEnjoy rich colors and stunning clarity on the 6.78-inch FHD+ AMOLED display, boasting a sharp 1080 x 2436 resolution and a dynamic refresh rate that switches between 60Hz, 120Hz, and 144Hz for buttery-smooth scrolling and optimized performance. Whether you're gaming or binge-watching, the display shines bright with up to 1300 nits peak brightness, and the Always-On Display feature keeps essential info visible at a glance.Dimensity 8350 Ultimate ChipsetPowered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, this phone runs like a beast. Built on an advanced 4nm architecture with an octa-core CPU and Mali-G615 MC6 GPU, it delivers ultra-fast performance and energy efficiency. Paired with 12GB RAM and 256GB internal storage, the Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5G handles everything from high-end gaming to multitasking with absolute ease.Pro-Grade Camera System with Dual OIS & 4K VideoCapture the moment with a triple rear camera setup featuring two 50MP OIS sensors and an 8MP lens for ultra-clear shots and steady videos. Whether you're recording in 4K at 60FPS, shooting in portrait mode, or experimenting with features like Super Night, Pro, or Dual Video mode, the results are nothing short of stunning. The 32MP front camera also ensures your selfies and vlogs are sharp, vibrant, and social-ready.Battery with Fast ChargingForget low battery anxiety with the massive 5200mAh battery that easily powers through a full day of use. And when it’s time to refuel, 100W fast charging gets you back to full power in no time. Plus, with reverse charging support, your phone becomes a portable power bank when needed.

Featuring a vivid 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a powerful Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, and industry-leading 100W fast charging, this smartphone is built to keep up with everything your day throws at you—from multitasking to mobile gaming to content creation.Features of Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5GAMOLED Display with Up to 144Hz Refresh Rate, Dimensity 8350 Ultimate Chipset, Pro-Grade Camera System with Dual OIS & 4K Video, 5200mAh Battery with 100W Fast Charging.AMOLED Display with Up to 144Hz Refresh RateEnjoy rich colors and stunning clarity on the 6.78-inch FHD+ AMOLED display, boasting a sharp 1080 x 2436 resolution and a dynamic refresh rate that switches between 60Hz, 120Hz, and 144Hz for buttery-smooth scrolling and optimized performance. Whether you're gaming or binge-watching, the display shines bright with up to 1300 nits peak brightness, and the Always-On Display feature keeps essential info visible at a glance.Dimensity 8350 Ultimate ChipsetPowered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, this phone runs like a beast. Built on an advanced 4nm architecture with an octa-core CPU and Mali-G615 MC6 GPU, it delivers ultra-fast performance and energy efficiency. Paired with 12GB RAM and 256GB internal storage, the Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5G handles everything from high-end gaming to multitasking with absolute ease.Pro-Grade Camera System with Dual OIS & 4K VideoCapture the moment with a triple rear camera setup featuring two 50MP OIS sensors and an 8MP lens for ultra-clear shots and steady videos. Whether you're recording in 4K at 60FPS, shooting in portrait mode, or experimenting with features like Super Night, Pro, or Dual Video mode, the results are nothing short of stunning. The 32MP front camera also ensures your selfies and vlogs are sharp, vibrant, and social-ready.Battery with Fast ChargingForget low battery anxiety with the massive 5200mAh battery that easily powers through a full day of use. And when it’s time to refuel, 100W fast charging gets you back to full power in no time. Plus, with reverse charging support, your phone becomes a portable power bank when needed.
